overview:
As Chief Financial Officer at Netviewer, Robert Gratzl is responsible for finance, controlling, and human resources. In these roles he can draw on extensive experience as CFO at publicly-traded WEB.DE AG and later Combots AG. Earlier in his career, Robert Gratzl was employed for ten years at consulting firm Arthur Andersen in Stuttgart, where he focused on consulting services for medium-sized companies. In 1998 he became the partner in charge of this area.

Robert Gratzl completed his degree in Business Administration at Rosenheim University of Applied Sciences. He earned certifications as Tax Adviser and Certified Public Accountant in 1994 and 1996, respectively.
